scripts.preversion: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.examples:ping: npm run file examples/ping-node-redis.ts && npm run file examples/ping-ioredis.ts
scripts.examples:fizz-buzz: npm run file examples/fizz-buzz-node-redis.ts && npm run file examples/fizz-buzz-ioredis.ts
scripts.examples:fizz-buzz-batch: npm run file examples/fizz-buzz-batch-node-redis.ts && npm run file examples/fizz-buzz-batch-ioredis.ts
scripts.benchmarks: npm run file benchmarks/incrby-node-redis.ts && npm run file benchmarks/incrby-ioredis.ts
scripts.benchmarks:http: npm run file benchmarks/incrby-http-node-redis.ts && npm run file benchmarks/incrby-http-ioredis.ts
